headline: Clorox Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend of $1.22 Per Share
summary: The Clorox Company (NYSE: CLX) announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.22 per share on the company's common stock. The dividend is payable February 14, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on January 29, 2025.
